sentences.en: A second laser can then be fired through the normally opaque sodium; it passes through, but not much faster than a racehorse can run.
sentences.cn: 然后，通过通常不透明的钠发射第二束激光；光线虽能通过, 但它运动的速度不会比一匹赛马更快。

sentences.en: a shower with an opaque glass door
sentences.cn: 装有不透明玻璃门的淋浴间

sentences.en: A standing opaque beacon may be useful in addition.
sentences.cn: 此外,也可以使用常设的实体觇标.

sentences.en: And some minutely crystalline varieties, such as flint, may be opaque and of a waxy luster.
sentences.cn: 某些细小的结晶变种, 如燧石, 可能是不透明的,并具有腊样的光泽.

sentences.en: Because of their short wavelength, x - rays can pass through objects which are opaque to ordinary light.
sentences.cn: 由于 X 射线的波长短, 它就能穿透一般光线所不能穿透的物体.

sentences.en: In advanced stages the opaque corneas may ulcerate and even perforate.
sentences.cn: 在疾病后期,不透明的角膜可能产生溃疡,甚至穿孔.

sentences.en: Materials through which no radiation is propagated are called opaque.
sentences.cn: 辐射线不能透过的物质叫不透明体.

sentences.en: opaque tights
sentences.cn: 不透明的连裤袜

sentences.en: Positive line work and letterpress must be opaque.
sentences.cn: 阳像线划原图和注记必须是不透明的.

sentences.en: Since the thermal radiation largely stopped by ordinary opaque materials, buildings and clothing can provide protection.
sentences.cn: 既然普通不透明的材料可以在很大程度上阻止住热辐射, 建筑物和衣服就能起防护作用.

sentences.en: The complex administrative arrangements render the decision - making process somewhat opaque.
sentences.cn: 复杂的行政协商使决策过程透明度不高.

sentences.en: The jargon in his talk was opaque to me.
sentences.cn: 他谈话中使用的行话对我是一团迷雾。

sentences.en: The method applies to both opaque and transparent objects.
sentences.cn: 这个方法既适用于不透明物体,又适用于透明物体.

sentences.en: The moving current is white and opaque due to the use of a bentonite solution.
sentences.cn: 由于采用膨润土溶液,流动的异重流为白色不透明的.

sentences.en: The once clear mountain stream is now polluted and opaque.
sentences.cn: 曾经是很清澈的山溪,现在受到污染变得混浊了.

sentences.en: The opaque, mad look came into his eyes again.
sentences.cn: 一种意思不很明确而又狂野的神色又出现在他的眼睛里.

sentences.en: The report was written in long, opaque sentences.
sentences.cn: 报告中的句子又长又难懂.

sentences.en: Unlike the other two, this is not an opaque type; its structure is documented.
sentences.cn: 与另外两个数据类型不同，这是一个透明的类型；其结构在文档中有介绍。

sentences.en: You can always use opaque glass if you need to block a street view.
sentences.cn: 如果不想从室内看到街景，可以使用不透明玻璃。

sentences.en: You can do that, but I find the syntax kind of opaque.
sentences.cn: 您可以这样做，但是我发现语法有些不透明。

trans.tran_cn: 不透明的，无光泽的，晦暗的，不传导性的，含糊的，迟钝的
trans.tran_en: (of glass, liquid, etc.) not clear enough to see through or allow light through
